frame.name: People_along_political_spectrum
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Individual</fen> belongs to a group that is categorized in terms of the political views on particular issues that the members of the group tend to share, in opposition to other groups that hold different beliefs on the issues. The views on particular issues that the <fen>Individual</fen> shares with the other members are assumed to result from general principles or beliefs rather than being accidental or temporary.
<ex><fex name="Individual"><t>Leftists</t></fex> vow huge protests during inauguration</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Individual
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Individual</fen> who is referred to in terms of their place along the political spectrum.
<ex>Why the <t><fex name="Individual">Left</fex></t> has lost credibility.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition:
<def-root>The location in which the <fen>Individual</fen> resides.
<ex>We need to reshape the agenda of the <t>left</t> <fex name="Place">in Hungary</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Domain
FE.definition:
<def-root>A set of issues that is used to identify a sub-set of the group members.
<ex>So where, oh where, can Democrats find a candidate who is a <fex name="Domain">fiscal</fex> <t>conservative</t>, a social moderate and well-liked in the West?</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Origin
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Origin</fen> is the place where the <fen>Individual</fen> was born or lived a salient part of her or his life.
<ex>We won the cold war and a lot of the <fex name="ori">French</fex> <t>left</t> has never gotten over that little fact of life.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Descriptor
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Descriptor</fen> is a temporary condition of the <fen>Individual</fen>.
<ex>I'm another one of those <fex name="Descriptor">angry</fex> <t>conservatives</t> that everyone hates!</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Persistent_characteristic
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Persistent_characteristic</fen> is a physiological characteristic or personality trait of the <fen>Individual</fen> which is conceived of as persisting over time.</def-root>

FE.name: Age
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Age</fen> is the length of time the <fen>Individual</fen> has been alive.
<ex>There is a history of <fex name="Age">young</fex> <t>leftists</t> gaining publicity and buzz.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Ethnicity
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Ethnicity</fen> is the religious, racial, national, socio-economic or cultural group to which the <fen>Individual</fen> belongs.</def-root>

FE.name: Position_qualifier
FE.definition: <def-root>A phrase that indicates more precisely the location in political space of the <fen>Individual</fen> relative to the center of the region designated by the target.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: left.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a group or party favouring radical, reforming, or socialist views.

lexUnit.name: conservative.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: (in a political context) a person favouring free enterprise, private ownership, and socially conservative ideas.

lexUnit.name: far-left.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a group or party favouring particularly radical, reforming, or socialist views.

lexUnit.name: far left.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a group or party favouring particularly radical, reforming, or socialist views.
